This app is created for the greater welfare of the people.
 
 In this app people will find the address and phone number of many hospital, blood bank, and ambulance service which help to save lives.
 
 People also find many kinds of shop address and phone number such as shopping center, hospital, computer shop, sports.
 
 From some Chittagong best shop.
 
 This app will be help people to save time and lives.
 
 Please don’t miss this app.
 
 Created By: Mirajul Hoq.
